title: [K-12] Immersive Virtual Reality-Based Experiential Learning and Science Competency Enhancement Through Debriefing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Providing practice-oriented educational environments utilizing VR equipment and digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce science experiment procedures with 90% accuracy through IVR simulation
After debriefing sessions, learners can analyze and suggest improvements for at least 80% of errors occurring during virtual experiments
Within two weeks after IVR experiential learning, learners can conduct experiments in real laboratories while complying with safety regulations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
